package test

p := $``

package test

p := $`foo
bar
baz
`

package test

p := $`{42},
{13.37},
{true},
{"foo"},
{null}`

package test

# no multi-value sets and maps, as order can't be guaranteed
p := $`{[]},
{[42, 13.37, true, "foo", null]},
{set()},
{{42}},
{{}},
{{"a": "b"}}`

package test

a := ["a", "b", "c"]

p := $`{[x | some x in a]}`

package test

a := ["a"]

# no multi-value sets, as order can't be guaranteed
p := $`{{x | some x in a}}`

package test

# no multi-value maps, as order can't be guaranteed
a := ["a"]

p := $`{{x: x | some x in a}}`

package test

a := "foo"
b := "bar"

p := $`{a}
{b}`

cases.note: string-interpolation/multi-line/nested template expressions, undefined outer expression
string-interpolation/multi-line/nested template expressions, undefined inner expression
string-interpolation/multi-line/template expressions with infix operand call
modules:
package test

a := 42

p := $`<sum>
  {1 + a}
</sum>`

package test

p := $`{input.x},
{data.y}`

package test

a := ["foo", "bar"]

p := [x | some y in a; x := $`<v>
{y}
</v>`]

package test

a := input.a
b := input.b

p := x if {
  x := $`foo {a} {b}`
    with input.a as 42
    with input.b as "bar"
}
